movies.name: Skyfall
movies.description: Skyfall is a James Bond film where Agent 007 must confront a former MI6 agent who threatens to expose and destroy the intelligence agency while delving into Bond's past.

movies.name: Joker
movies.description: Joker is a film that delves into the origin story of the iconic Batman villain, exploring the descent of a mentally unstable man named Arthur Fleck into madness and his transformation into the Joker.

movies.name: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: Avengers: Endgame is a film where the surviving members of the Avengers, along with their allies, embark on a mission to reverse the devastating effects of Thanos' snap and restore balance to the universe.
